title: Featherstone Academy: Volume I
description: LUNA'S COMPLETED STORYFEATHERSTONE ACADEMY BOOKS 1-3“We’re here to assist with your transition to Featherstone Academy.”Suddenly thrown into a world representing bloodlines I know nothing about, forcing my past I refuse to remember into the present, has my world turned upside down.It doesn’t matter that I didn’t want to go to college, it doesn’t matter that I don’t want to be here.I’ll follow the rules or risk my life. The organization that runs the criminal underworld is no joke.Apparently, I’m an Ace now, but few are happy about my arrival.Secrets have me wanting to run for the hills.Boys have curly hair, skull tattoos, big mouths, and gentle caresses.A diamond has me wanting to make the world a better place.For a lone ranger, my small world just got bigger.What are you willing to do to survive?THIS OMNIBUS CONTAINS THE FIRST THREE BOOKS FROM THE FEATHERSTONE ACADEMY SERIES, GIVING YOU LUNA'S COMPLETED STORY;MY BLOODLINEYOUR BLOODLINEOUR BLOODLINEWITH THE ADDITION OF 2 POINT OF VIEW SCENE CHANGES AT THE END OF MY BLOODLINE & YOUR BLOODLINE. FOLLOWED BY A SUPER EXTENDED EPILOGUE. GIVING YOU AN EXTRA 27,000 WORDS ON TOP OF THE INDIVIDUAL BOOKS.This is a Reverse Harem boxset, recommended for those over 17. Including scenes of a sexual natural and MM. 322,000 words in total, some scenes may be considered triggers. Filled with violence, anger, and blood shed.
author: K.C. Kean
